name: ide-ruff
description: Python linting and formatting powered by Ruff LSP server

ruffExecutable.title: Ruff Executable
ruffExecutable.description: Path to the ruff executable. Leave as 'ruff' to use the one in your PATH.

configuration.title: Configuration File
configuration.description: Path to ruff.toml or pyproject.toml. Leave empty to auto-detect from project root.

lineLength.title: Line Length
lineLength.description: Maximum line length for linting (E501) and formatting. Set to 0 to use value from config file (default: 88).

targetVersion.title: Target Python Version
targetVersion.description: Minimum Python version to target for syntax and feature checks. Leave empty to auto-detect or use config file.

exclude.title: Exclude Patterns
exclude.description: File/folder patterns to exclude from linting (e.g., "venv/*", "**/migrations/*"). Leave empty to use config file.

syntax.title: Show Syntax Errors
syntax.description: Display Python syntax errors (invalid code). Disable if another package handles syntax errors.

enable.title: Enable Linting
enable.description: Show lint diagnostics (errors and warnings) in the editor.

preview.title: Preview Mode
preview.description: Enable unstable lint rules that are still in development.

useNoqa.title: Use Noqa Comments
useNoqa.description: Respect # noqa comments to suppress specific lint warnings. Disable to ignore noqa comments.

select.title: Select Rules
select.description: Rule codes to enable (replaces defaults): E, F, W, I, UP, etc. Leave empty to use config file.

ignore.title: Ignore Rules
ignore.description: Rule codes to disable (replaces config). Overrides selected rules.

extendSelect.title: Extend Select Rules
extendSelect.description: Additional rule codes to enable (extends config file, doesn't replace).

extendIgnore.title: Extend Ignore Rules
extendIgnore.description: Additional rule codes to disable (extends config file, doesn't replace).

fixable.title: Fixable Rules
fixable.description: Rule codes that can be auto-fixed. Leave empty to allow all fixable rules.

unfixable.title: Unfixable Rules
unfixable.description: Rule codes that should NOT be auto-fixed, even if they have fixes available.

preview.title: Preview Mode
preview.description: Enable unstable formatter features that are still in development.

indentStyle.title: Indent Style
indentStyle.description: Indentation style for formatting. Leave empty to use config file (default: space).

indentWidth.title: Indent Width
indentWidth.description: Number of spaces per indentation level. Set to 0 to use config file (default: 4).

quoteStyle.title: Quote Style
quoteStyle.description: Quote style for strings. Leave empty to use config file (default: double).

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Show 'Quick Fix' action in intentions menu to auto-fix individual lint violations.

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Show 'Disable rule' action in intentions menu to add # noqa comments.

organizeImports.title: Organize Imports
organizeImports.description: Show 'Organize Imports' action in intentions menu. Sorts and groups imports (isort-compatible).

fixAll.title: Fix All
fixAll.description: Show 'Fix All' action in intentions menu. Auto-fixes all fixable lint violations in the file at once.

deleteOnOpen.title: Delete Project Lint on File Open
deleteOnOpen.description: Delete project-wide lint messages for a file when it is opened in the editor. Restart needed.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Log debug info to developer console (View > Developer > Toggle Developer Tools).
